name: Cause Set Extension Check

when.pattern: event e with cause\_set₁(e) extended to cause\_set₂(e)
when.condition: cause\_set₁(e) ⊂ cause\_set₂(e) and Π(e | cause\_set₂(e)) \< Π(e | cause\_set₁(e))

action.details: adjust Π(e | cause\_set₂(e)) upward or retract offending cause from cause\_set₂(e).

result: extension of causes never decreases Π(e)
